name: @hankei6km/gdrive-act-recv
description: This action receives a file from Google Drive.
author: hankei6km <hankei6km@gmail.com> (https://github.com/hankei6km)

scripts.build: npm run clean && ncc build src/index.ts --license licenses.txt && rm -r dist/test && mv dist/src/* dist/ && rm -r dist/src && mv dist/index.js dist/index.mjs && npm run gen-readme
scripts.test:build: npm run build && npm run test
